Returns the profile of the currently authenticated artist.

put.description: Update fields of the currently authenticated artist's profile.

post.summary: Upload or update current artist's profile picture
post.description: Uploads a new profile picture for the currently authenticated artist, replacing any existing one.

post.summary: Upload or update current artist's cover photo
post.description: Uploads a new cover photo for the currently authenticated artist, replacing any existing one.

get.description: Return a paginated list of service provider profiles.

schema.title: Response List Services Api V1 Services  Get

post.description:
Create a new service for the currently authenticated artist.
Full path → POST /api/v1/services/

put.description:
Update a service owned by the currently authenticated artist.
Full path → PUT /api/v1/services/{service_id}

get.description:
Get a specific service by its ID (publicly accessible).
Full path → GET /api/v1/services/{service_id}

delete.description:
Delete a service owned by the currently authenticated artist.
Full path → DELETE /api/v1/services/{service_id}

get.description:
Get all services offered by a specific artist (by their user_id).
Full path → GET /api/v1/services/artist/{artist_user_id}

schema.title: Response Read Services By Artist Api V1 Services Artist  Artist User Id  Get
Response List Service Categories Api V1 Service Categories  Get

post.description: Create a new booking.  Only authenticated clients may book services from artists.

get.description: Return bookings for the authenticated client, optionally filtered.

get.description: Return all bookings for the currently authenticated artist.

schema.title: Response Read Artist Bookings Api V1 Bookings Artist Bookings Get

patch.description: Update the status of a booking.  Only the artist who owns that booking may call this.

get.description:
Return the details of a single booking.  
Accessible if the current user is either the booking’s client or the booking’s artist.
Return an ICS file for a confirmed booking.

schema.title: Response Download Booking Calendar Api V1 Bookings  Booking Id  Calendar Ics Get

post.description:
Create a review for a specific booking.
Only the client who made the booking can review it, and only if it's completed.

schema.title: The ID of the booking to review

get.description: Get a specific review by its ID (which is the booking_id).

List all reviews for a specific service provider.
This requires joining through Bookings and Services or directly if Review had artist_id.
For now, let's assume reviews are primarily linked to bookings.

schema.title: Response List Reviews For Service Provider Api V1 Reviews Service Provider Profiles  Service Provider Id  Reviews Get

get.description: List all reviews for a specific service.

schema.title: Response List Reviews For Service Api V1 Reviews Services  Service Id  Reviews Get

get.description: Retrieve the NLP parsing result for a previously queued task.

get.description: Retrieve booking requests made by the current client.

schema.title: Response Read My Client Booking Requests Api V1 Booking Requests Me Client Get

get.description: Retrieve booking requests made to the current artist.

schema.title: Response Read My Artist Booking Requests Api V1 Booking Requests Me Artist Get

get.description:
Retrieve a specific booking request by its ID.
Accessible by the client who made it or the artist it was made to.

put.description:
Update a booking request (e.g., message, proposed times) or withdraw it.
Only accessible by the client who created the request.

Update a booking request status (e.g., decline it).
Only accessible by the artist to whom the request was made.

get.description: Return monthly inquiries, profile views, and response rate for the artist.

Retrieve a specific quote by ID.
Accessible by the client of the booking request or the artist who made the quote.

post.description:
Create a new quote for a specific booking request.
Only the artist to whom the request was made can create a quote.
The `quote_in` schema's `booking_request_id` must match `request_id` from path.

get.description:
Retrieve all quotes associated with a specific booking request.
Accessible by the client who made the request or the artist it was made to.

schema.title: Response Read Quotes For Booking Request Api V1 Booking Requests  Request Id  Quotes Get

get.description: Retrieve all quotes made by the current artist.

schema.title: Response Read My Artist Quotes Api V1 Quotes Me Artist Get

put.description:
Update a quote's status (accept or reject).
Only accessible by the client to whom the quote was offered (via booking request).

Update quote details or withdraw a quote.
Only accessible by the artist who created the quote.

post.description: Artist confirms a client-accepted quote, which creates a formal Booking.
Return a quick quote estimation used during booking flow.
